name: Lost Myself
description:
It starts in an unfamiliar place, without explaining who you are and how you got there. That's what you will be trying to figure out in small yet complicated story.

Don't let your guard down!

Game is filled with opportunities for you to make a mistake and lose progress. Pay attention to your environment, dialogues and don't forget about mechanics you learnt earlier.

Think before you act!

Almost every death can be avoided if you take your time to think it through.

Brute tactics or thoughtful approach?

Although it's more rewarding to solve things by yourself, you can totally complete some parts through trial and error.

When "Lost Myself" is avaliable on Steam, everyone who bought it will naturally recieve a key.

If you experienced an issue or spotted a bug, please, fill this form or contact me via email.

I'd love to hear your feedback on the game, so if you don't want to post it in the comment section for some reason, you can fill the anonymous form.
